code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,legacy_createStore as createStore,compose}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profile-reducer";import dialogsReducer from"./dialogs-reducer";import sidebarReducer from"./sidebar-reducer";import usersReducer from"./users-reducer";import authReducer from"./auth-reducer";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import appReducer from"./app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({profilePage:profileReducer,messagesPage:dialogsReducer,sitebar:sidebarReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));window.__store__=store;export default store;
